text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
According to the course description, the upcoming 
route should be to the right. However…

text_block_list.name: Spooky Noise
text_block_list.text: ooooooo…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
So, you are telling me "that is not the case…" 
In that case, I shall heed your warning.

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl C
text_block_list.text:
How did she avoid our trap like that!? Still, the other route has 
a hill, so she shouldn't be able to run too quickly.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I see. So, they showed us a fake route to throw us 
off. However, if I were to simply take the other 
path, I would be greeted by an abrupt uphill.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
(I'm sure that the Gungnir members have an easier 
3rd route that only they're aware of. I could still try 
to follow them, but…)

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
They're… not exactly alone in using tricks. In that case, 
at least I can… take this hill head on. Hn…!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text: Head! This is the Woods Course Point C1! There's a problem!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl D
text_block_list.text:
M-Manhattan Café is scaling the hill at a rapid pace! 
At this rate, she'll definitely blow past the hill route!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
What!? In that case, contact Point E1 ASAP! 
Have them get ready!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
The presence of those behind me and next to me disappeared? 
Did they stop running? If so, I should be able to maintain 
the lead while leaving the woods.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …! Suddenly there's someone in front of me! When did they…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hey Café, those guys at Gungnir are all wearing 
the same black jerseys and masks. Do you think 
that's for sun protection?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
No way. Did they prepare the course with potential substitutes? 
Did they really plan on closing the difference between us by 
swapping their runners during the race…?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
They look the same, so it's hard to distinguish different runners. Now 
that I think about it, I couldn't really get a good look at their 
faces… It's hard to tell them apart…

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
… No. No matter what they try to pull, 
my objective remains the same…!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Kuku, take a look. My team is already here. Don't 
tell me your team is having some trouble?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Sure, it does seem that way. Still…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Can't you see that my teammate is coming right now?

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
N-no way! How the heck did she get past that hill so fast!? 
But the difference in distance is still…!

text_block_list.name: Gungnir Horsegirl E
text_block_list.text: Head!! We're counting on you!!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Alright! You all did well! Leave the rest 
to me! See ya, Jungle Pocket! You lose!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Just keep talking. 
Café! Keep it up!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Apologies. I kept you waiting.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
No worries! All that's left is for me 
to put these kids in their place.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Ora Ora Ora Ora Ora Ora Ora Ora!!! Ha ha ha ha! 
Come on, come on, come on, come on, come on!!!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
T-the hell. What's up with her freakish 
acceleration!? Hey, block her path!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Bring it on, bring it on! Throw as many as you want at me! 
I'll show you just how sharp my fangs can be!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! What, can't breathe!?

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Is this girl serious…!? When did she get here!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's wonderful isn't it. That girl's direct last spurt. 
Kuku, it really is a work of art.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Still, I personally think she's using too 
much energy. By the way, when did you…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Move out of the way! This is who I am! Jungle Pocket!!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Hell yeah!! Goal!! This is my victoryyyyyyy!!!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: I'm very sorry for bad mouthing you!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Well, someone's good at apologizing. Let me leave you 
with this. Tracen Academy is a place where there are many 
other horsegirls above me.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
What did they call it? A frog in the well? Anyways, 
for your punishment, don't go around setting up 
these territories like some lame poser.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: There's even stronger horsegirls… than you?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
For now, at least. In time I will take the peak for myself. I'll prove 
it to you. Even among the best, I will be the strongest.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Once that day comes, my legend where I challenged the peak 
will be spread all around. If anything, I like how y'all had serious 
guts thinking you could defeat me.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's head back! Tachyon, Café, I'm really thankful to 
the two of you today! I'm pretty hungry myself, so let's get 
something to eat!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: W-wait!! Your running has really opened up our eyes!!

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
We won't go around trying to be someone else! 
We'll work hard to improve our freestyle running! 
… Please take us on as your underlings!!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: What? Don't wanna.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text:
Oof! Y-yeah, of course you'd say that… 
Excuse me for that. We're just bugs…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Having underlings is just a pain. But as friends? 
That's something I could do.

text_block_list.name: Head of Gungnir
text_block_list.text: Po-Pokke!!! Big ups to ya!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Magnificent! "A beautiful friendship that blossomed even 
outside the school!" To commemorate this moment, shall we 
take a photo together!? No, I insist that we must! Come!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
A picture? Well, if you want concrete proof, 
that's fine. Hey everyone, form a line!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me… all this was for the pamphlet…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Kuku, and wasn't this just the perfect story? We can use this 
as the ultimate submission for the student council. By the way, 
why exactly did you want to come here?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I already handled that earlier… This place has already 
settled down and will be a cause for concern no longer. 
Don't worry about it……

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Guess all's well that ends well. In that case, let's join 
our new friends in the group. Aha ha ha!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …… Just once, I wish that you'd get upset over something…
